# 🧭 🧮 Reading Guide — Programming

This guide provides a suggested reading order for those who wish to study Programming in a structured way.  
It brings together the main content available in the section, organizing articles and reflections into a coherent path — from introduction to advanced topics.

---

## ✅ Suggested Order

1. **[📘 📐 LaTeX Models for Quarto](latex/models-latex-quarto.qmd)** — Start here to explore how LaTeX can be integrated into Quarto for elegant and structured scientific production.  
2. **[📘 📄 YAML in Quarto](quarto/yaml-in-quarto.qmd)** — Begin by understanding the metadata structure of `.qmd` files.  
3. **[📘 📄 Quarto Markdown Models — Part 1](quarto/models-markdown.qmd)** — Learn to write clearly using Quarto Markdown.  
4. **[📘 📄 Quarto Markdown Models — Part 2](quarto/others-models-markdown.qmd)** — Continue with advanced Quarto Markdown structures.  
5. **[📘 📄 index.qmd Models](quarto/models-index-quarto.qmd)** — Organize your project with best practices for building sections.  
6. **[📘 📄 🐍 Python Models for Quarto](python/models-python-quarto.qmd)** — See how to use Python to generate visualizations and dynamic results inside Quarto documents.  
7. **[📘 📄 📊 R Models for Quarto](r/models-r-quarto.qmd)** — Learn how to use R in the Quarto context to create interactive and well-structured documents.  

📌 This guide is updated as new content is published.
